issue.title: [Dev] Display our nightly analysis somewhere so that people can see it
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13061](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13061). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a markdown report that uses the saved nightly data to create a static site that we can publish on gh-pages (of ursacomputing/crossbow, or of the other ursacomputing repository that we are storing the data of the nightly builds in)
